bossDialog: WOT are ya DOIN' in my 'OUSE?! I'll mosh yer ugly 'ead in!
Ya 'avin a laff? Ya startin' summat?! I'll fold yer in 'alf like a leaf I swear on me mum!
Ya scrawny lil RUNT! I'd eat yer, but yer so tiny I couldn't even pick me teeth with ya!

master.dialog: Trolls are crafty creatures who employ all manner of tricks and traps to take down their foes. No strategy, regardless of how ruthless, is beneath a Troll - and that's why I like them so much!\n\nFight me!
master.name: Karm

name: Troll
